programme.title: India-Pakistan: The New Red Line
programme.desc: India and Pakistan – nuclear-armed neighbours – have gone to war before. But a brief, intense battle in May this year marked a dramatic shift in their equations. programme.title: Kotielainten pelastaja
programme.desc: The Barn Sanctuaryn porsaat ovat valmiita muuttamaan uuteen tilavaan palatsiinsa. Henkilokunta jarjestaa Andy-lehman kuoleman jalkeen muistotilaisuuden.

programme.title: Meet The Orangutans
programme.desc: Seuraa orpojen orankivauvojen elamaa Borneossa, kun ne tuodaan kasvamaan maailman vanhimpaan orankien turvapaikkaan ennen kuin ne palautetaan takaisin luontoon.

programme.title: Meet The Orangutans
programme.desc: Seuraa orpojen orankivauvojen elamaa Borneossa, kun ne tuodaan kasvamaan maailman vanhimpaan orankien turvapaikkaan ennen kuin ne palautetaan takaisin luontoon.

programme.title: Matkalla elainlaakariksi
programme.desc: Sarjassa seurataan kuuden elainlaakariopiskelijan elamaa ja opintoja heidan viimeisena opiskeluvuotenaan. Tulevien elainlaakareiden hoivissa apua saavat kaikenkarvaiset elaimet koosta riippumatta. (Life at Vet U, tosi-tv, USA, 2016)

programme.title: Teksasin riistanvalvojat
programme.desc: Teksasin riistanvalvojat taistelevat rikoksia vastaan ja suojelevat osavaltion luonnonvaroja. Valvojat loytavat rajajoelta laittomia verkkoja huumekuriireja etsiessaan.

programme.title: Erakkoperhe eramaassa
programme.desc: Villit ja vapaat Brownit elavat Alaskan eramaassa. Seitsenlapsisen perheen elama kaikkien modernien mukavuuksien ulkopuolella riippuu perheenjasenten keskinaisesta yhteistyosta.

programme.title: Erakkoperhe eramaassa
programme.desc: Villit ja vapaat Brownit elavat Alaskan eramaassa. Seitsenlapsisen perheen elama kaikkien modernien mukavuuksien ulkopuolella riippuu perheenjasenten keskinaisesta yhteistyosta.

programme.title: Ihmeelliset elaimet
programme.desc: Kausi 1, osa 27. Elaimet tekevat uskomattomia asioita, mutta oletko koskaan pohtinut miten tai miksi? Sarjassa vastatataan kiehtovimpiin elainaiheisiin kysymyksiin. (How Do Animals Do That?, dokumentti, USA, 2019)

programme.title: Ihmeelliset elaimet
programme.desc: Elaimet tekevat uskomattomia asioita, mutta oletko koskaan pohtinut miten tai miksi? Sarjassa vastatataan kiehtovimpiin elainaiheisiin kysymyksiin.

programme.title: Animal Cops Miami
programme.desc: Miamin hylatyt. Miamin elainpoliisit kokevat tehtavan itselleen erityisen laheiseksi, kun he loytavat kaksi jo adoptoitua koiraa kadulta avun tarpeessa.

programme.title: Animal Cops Miami
programme.desc: Surua riittaa tutkija Labradan yrittaessa pelastaa omistajiensa hylkaaman sairaan koiran. Nuori tytto pelastaa hevosen, joka on jatetty ilman ruokaa ja vetta.

programme.title: Animal Cops Miami
programme.desc: Elainjulmuuksien tutkijat uivat alligaattorivesissa pelastaakseen vammautuneen alligaattorin. Miamin tahan mennessa suurimmassa kaappauksessa maatilalta pelastetaan 400 elainta!

programme.title: Wild Dubai
programme.desc: Modernin Dubain taakse katkeytyy salaisuus: uskomaton villi luonto, joka kantaa ajatonta yhteytta aavikkoon, mereen ja kansan historiaan ja perinteeseen.

programme.title: Hurjimmat minielaimet
programme.desc: Uusimmalla kamerateknologialla luonnollisessa ymparistossaan kuvatut minihirviot nayttavat taitojaan ja pullistelevat juuri niin isoina kuin ne kuvittelevat olevansa.

programme.title: Hurjimmat minielaimet
programme.desc: Madagaskarin Manambatosta etsitaan tomaattisammakkoa. Se on yksi maailman merkittavimmista vaijyvista pedoista ja pystyy hautautumaan maahan vain muutamassa sekunnissa.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Kausi 1, osa 2. Denverin intohimoisin ja periksiantamattomin elainlaakari Jeff Young luotsaa Planned Pethood Plus -klinikkaansa suurella sydamella. Dr. Jeff tiimeineen hoitaa kaikenkarvaisia elaimia seka klinikalla etta siirtymalla tarpeen tullen paikan paalle syrjaisiin kohteisiin. (Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet, tosi-tv, USA, 2015)

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Klinikalle tuodulla koiralla epaillaan murtunutta jalkaa, mutta tri Jeffin diagnoosi kertoo jotain paljon vakavampaa. Lisaksi kissa joutuu pulaan ruokahalunsa takia.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Robert hoitaa vihaista Bunker-vompattia. Jattianakonda Nikilla on edessaan muuttopaiva. Terri hoitaa satoja sateenkaarilureja, jotka ovat loukkaantuneet raekuurossa.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Terri tarkastaa pahoin loukkaantuneen Daniel-vallabin, joka ei pysty kavelemaan. Robert ja Chandler hyppaavat hetkeksi aalloille ennen uuden komodonvaraanin noutamista.

programme.title: Atlantan akvaario
programme.desc: Keskuksen tyontekijat mittaavat Trixie-valashain laserkameroilla. Lisaksi ujo kotelokilpikonna saa uuden ystavan.

programme.title: Ehdonalaisvangit koirankouluttajina
programme.desc: Lizzy yrittaa loytaa pelastuskeskuksen pihalle sidotun koiran omistajan. Vanhempi pariskunta saapuu katselemaan ensimmaista koiraansa.

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Jackson auttaa traumaperaisesta stressihairiosta karsivaa sotaveteraania, joka on alkanut ahdistua terapiakissastaan. Bartholomew repii hajalle paitsi huonekalut, myos avioliiton.

programme.title: Koteja lemmikkiperheille
programme.desc: Perheen kaksi nigerialaista kaapiovuohta aiheuttaa sekasortoa takapihalla! Antonio tekee pihasta hauskan vuohien leikkikentan, johon kuuluu mm. kiipeilytorni.

programme.title: Koteja lemmikkiperheille
programme.desc: Palomies Ricky on pelastanut palavasta rakennuksesta burmanpythonin. Kellarin muokkaaminen valtaisaksi kaarmemaailmaksi on yksi Antonion kaikkien aikojen suurimmista hankkeista.

programme.title: Harvinaisten elainten jaljilla
programme.desc: Madagaskarin Pachy-makit olivat punaturkkisia, lahes isojen apinoiden kokoisia jattilaisia. Forrest etsii puiden latvustosta todisteita, etta laji on edelleen hengissa.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: ATL-rappari 2 Chainz etsii itselleen Tanked-out -akvaariota. Kun Wayde hukkaa tarkeat mitat, han painostaa Redneckin juuri taman akvaarion pariin.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: Maailmanmestarinyrkkeilija Fernando Vargas tilaa nyrkkeilyhanskan muotoisen akvaarion harjoitussalilleen Las Vegasiin. Tuleeko siita taystyrmays?

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: Howie Mandel tilaa uuden akvaarion, talla kertaa yllatykseksi agenttinsa yritykselle. Jo olemassa oleva akvaario tarvitsee paivitysta.

programme.title: Alaska: Surviving the Last Frontier
programme.desc: Tim, Allan ja Jasmine kokevat Alaskan ilmaston raakuuden lahtiessaan retkelle, jolla ylitetaan jokia ja jaatikoita ja kamppaillaan lumimyrskyssa.

programme.title: Animal ER
programme.desc: Nelivuotias maltanterrieri Therodore saapuu sairaalaan mystisten oireiden takia. Koiran tilan heiketessa laakarit tuskailevat diagnoosin kanssa.

programme.title: Kotielainten pelastaja
programme.desc: Dan McKernan jatti kaupunkielaman taakseen, muutti Michiganin maaseudulle ja perusti maatilalleen elainsuojelualueen. Sarjassa otetaan katsaus tilan sydanta lammittaviin pelastustarinoihin ja jokapaivaiseen elamaan.

programme.title: Beast Lands
programme.desc: Yhdessa aseistetun joukon kanssa Dave auttaa suojelemaan Koillis-Intian kylia, joissa riehuvat norsut mellastavat keskella yota.

programme.title: Harvinaisten elainten jaljilla
programme.desc: Madagaskarin Pachy-makit olivat punaturkkisia, lahes isojen apinoiden kokoisia jattilaisia. Forrest etsii puiden latvustosta todisteita, etta laji on edelleen hengissa.

programme.title: Teksasin riistanvalvojat
programme.desc: Teksasin riistanvalvojat soluttautuvat mustaan porssiin taistelemaan laitonta villielainkauppaa vastaan. Kiinni jaanyt laiton myyja menee sekaisin.

programme.title: Erakkoperhe eramaassa
programme.desc: Alkaa uusintana. Seitsenlapsinen Brownin perhe asuu Alaskan eramaassa. Perheenjasenet ovat riippuvaisia toisistaan yrittaessaan selviytya karussa ymparistossa.

programme.title: Erakkoperhe eramaassa
programme.desc: Alaskan eramaassa asuu villina kasvanut perhe. Billy ja Amy Brown ja heidan seitseman lastaan elavat riippumattomina palveluverkkojen ulkopuolella ja parjaavat yhteispelilla.

programme.title: Fish Or Die
programme.desc: Tiimi kulkee vihjeen perassa syrjaiselle joelle Gronlannissa, mista pitaisi loytya rautua. He selvittavat myos tarua, jonka mukaan atlantinlohi pesii yksinaisella joella.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Kausi 1 osa 1/14. Krokotiilimiehena tunnetuksi tulleen Steve Irwinin perinto elaa hanen leskessaan Terrissa seka lapsissaan Bindissa ja Robertissa. Intohimoisina luonnonsuojelijoina he pyorittavat aivan erityislaatuista Australian elaintarhaa, jossa toimii myos huipputason villielainsairaala. (Crikey! Its The Irwins, tosi-tv, USA, 2018)

programme.title: Project Grizzly
programme.desc: Karhujen kotouttaminen metsaan on loppusuoralla. Jeffilla on opetettavanaan enaa yksi oppitunti - ihmisen pelko. Ovatko vapautettavat elaimet valmiita selviamaan omillaan?

programme.title: Dogs: The Untold Story
programme.desc: Koirat ovat kehittyneet villeista saalistajista lempeiksi lemmikeiksi. Tietyissa osissa maailmaa koiria hemmotellaan niin kuin pikkulapsia.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Tri Amy saa haasteen, kun paksu Chubbs-katti tarvitsee kiireellista kasvoleikkausta. Ryhma hoitaa myos labradorinnoutajaa, joka on saanut annoksen karkeita hauleja takamukseensa.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: MOB Museum tekee ATM:lle tarjouksen, josta se ei voi kieltaytya! Museo tilaa Las Vegasin kieltolaki- ja salakapakka -nayttelyyn akvaarion, jossa on uponnut rommilaiva.

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Kausi 1, osa 7. Houston toivottaa tervetulleiksi elainlaakarit Bluen, Rossin ja Lavignen, joilla on kadet taynna toita aina riskialttiista leikkauksista sairaiden kameleonttien diagnosointiin. (The Vet Life, tosi-tv, USA, 2016)

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Kausi 1, osa 8. Houston toivottaa tervetulleiksi elainlaakarit Bluen, Rossin ja Lavignen, joilla on kadet taynna toita aina riskialttiista leikkauksista sairaiden kameleonttien diagnosointiin. (The Vet Life, tosi-tv, USA, 2016)

programme.title: Teksasin riistanvalvojat
programme.desc: Realitysarja Teksasin riistanvalvojista, jotka suojelevat seka ihmisia etta elaimia Yhdysvaltain toiseksi suurimman osavaltion laajalla alueella. Tyopaivien aikana vastaan tulee kaikkea mahdollista salametsastajista tulvien uhreihin ja vaarallisiin villielaimiin. Riistanvalvojat etsivat alligaattoria, joka on purrut miesta ja taman 13-vuotiasta poikaa. Lansi-Teksasista loytynyt hylatty auto antaa aihetta uskoa, etta teinitytto on kadonnut.

programme.title: Fish Or Die
programme.desc: Kausi 1 osa 7/10. Nelja raskaan sarjan kalamiesta ja ystavysta yhdistaa sarjassa voimansa, silla he haluavat olla ensimmaisina kalassa maailman syrjaisimmilla vesilla. Vaikka henki menisi. Paastakseen katkettyjen, mystisten vesien ja niissa piileskelevien tarunhohtoisten kalojen luo Chris, Thad, Brian ja Jay joutuvat mm. istumaan ratissa ajotunteja laskematta, taittamaan taivalta kiikkeralla lautalla ja raivaamaan tietaan kesyttomassa viidakossa. (Fish or Die, tosi-tv, USA, 2019)

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Puumajarakentamisen erikoisosaaja Pete Nelson kay lapi kaudella aikaisemmin nayttamatonta kuvamateriaalia, muistelee hurjia tilanteita ja epaortodoksisia rakennustekniikoita.

programme.title: Ehdonalaisvangit koirankouluttajina
programme.desc: Kausi 10, osa 19. Tia Torres kuntouttaa kaltoinkohdeltuja amerikanpitbullterriereita ehdonalaisvankien avulla Villalobosin pelastuskeskuksessa. Tekemista riittaa, kun tyontekijoiden pyrkimyksena on myos muuttaa ihmisten asenteita kiisteltya ja pelattya koirarotua kohtaan. (Pit Bulls and Parolees, tosi-tv, USA, 2018)

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Jackson miettii miten hillita ahdistuneen kissan holtitonta virtsailua. Miten huonoa omaatuntoa poteva omistaja saadaan lopettamaan lasagnen syottaminen diabeetikkokissalleen?

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Kausi 1 osa 1/14. Krokotiilimiehena tunnetuksi tulleen Steve Irwinin perinto elaa hanen leskessaan Terrissa seka lapsissaan Bindissa ja Robertissa. Intohimoisina luonnonsuojelijoina he pyorittavat aivan erityislaatuista Australian elaintarhaa, jossa toimii myos huipputason villielainsairaala. (Crikey! Its The Irwins, tosi-tv, USA, 2018)

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Tri Amy saa haasteen, kun paksu Chubbs-katti tarvitsee kiireellista kasvoleikkausta. Ryhma hoitaa myos labradorinnoutajaa, joka on saanut annoksen karkeita hauleja takamukseensa.

programme.title: Koteja lemmikkiperheille
programme.desc: Suunnittelija Antonio Ballatore rakastaa elaimia. Hanen intohimonaan on yhdessa tiiminsa kanssa kunnostaa ransistyneita ja ahtaita koteja seka niiden pihoja uuteen, elain- ja ihmisystavallisempaan kuosiin.

programme.title: Alaska Monsters
programme.desc: Ryhma tutkii nakohavaintoja jattimaisesta sudesta. Todd rakentaa ison vankisellin, johon otus mahtuu talteen ja Levi asentaa laser-teknologiaa.

programme.title: Erakkoperhe eramaassa
programme.desc: Alaskan eramaassa asuu villina syntynyt ja kasvanut perhe. Billy ja Amy Brown ja heidan seitseman lastaan elavat julkisten palveluiden ulkopuolella ja selviavat yhteispelilla.

programme.title: Teksasin riistanvalvojat
programme.desc: Realitysarja Teksasin riistanvalvojista, jotka suojelevat seka ihmisia etta elaimia Yhdysvaltain toiseksi suurimman osavaltion laajalla alueella. Tyopaivien aikana vastaan tulee kaikkea mahdollista salametsastajista tulvien uhreihin ja vaarallisiin villielaimiin. Riistanvalvojat etsivat alligaattoria, joka on purrut miesta ja taman 13-vuotiasta poikaa. Lansi-Teksasista loytynyt hylatty auto antaa aihetta uskoa, etta teinitytto on kadonnut.

programme.title: Cats of Claw Hill
programme.desc: Animal Planetin uusi saippuadokumenttisarja valottaa kotikissojen yksityista maailmaa kiehtovasti seuraten kissojen arkielamaa kissaperspektiivista.

programme.title: Cats of Claw Hill
programme.desc: Animal Planetin uusi saippuadokumenttisarja valottaa kotikissojen yksityista maailmaa kiehtovasti seuraten kissojen arkielamaa kissaperspektiivista.

programme.title: Harvinaisten elainten jaljilla
programme.desc: Kausi 1, osa 3. Mita jos sukupuuttoon kuolleita lajeja onkin edelleen olemassa? Villielaimiin erikoistunut biologi Forrest Galante kiertaa maapalloa etsimassa lajeja, jotka muu maailma on jo unohtanut. Tyovalineinaan hanella on huipputeknologiaa seka kaikkiin elaimiin kohdistuva syva tiedonjano. Etsinnat vievat Forrestin kaukaisiin ja joskus vaarallisiinkin paikkoihin. (Extinct Or Alive, tosi-tv, USA, 2018)

programme.title: Canopy Kings
programme.desc: Puumajoja tilaustyona rakentava Django Kroner aloittaa uuden rakennuksen Kentuckyssa. Asiakas haluaa majan yli 20 metrin korkeuteen, joten Django lahtee ottamaan oppia sirkuksesta.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: MOB Museum tekee ATM:lle tarjouksen, josta se ei voi kieltaytya! Museo tilaa Las Vegasin kieltolaki- ja salakapakka -nayttelyyn akvaarion, jossa on uponnut rommilaiva.

programme.title: Cats of Claw Hill
programme.desc: Animal Planetin uusi saippuadokumenttisarja valottaa kotikissojen yksityista maailmaa kiehtovasti seuraten kissojen arkielamaa kissaperspektiivista.

programme.title: Cats of Claw Hill
programme.desc: Animal Planetin uusi saippuadokumenttisarja valottaa kotikissojen yksityista maailmaa kiehtovasti seuraten kissojen arkielamaa kissaperspektiivista.

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Kausi 1, osa 7. Houston toivottaa tervetulleiksi elainlaakarit Bluen, Rossin ja Lavignen, joilla on kadet taynna toita aina riskialttiista leikkauksista sairaiden kameleonttien diagnosointiin. (The Vet Life, tosi-tv, USA, 2016)

programme.title: Life Below Zero: Canada
programme.desc: See the long, dark, frozen winters to sweltering, bug-infested summers in remote Canada.

programme.title: The Worlds Most Scenic Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Starting 1 mile above sea level in Colorados state capital Denver, cameras follow the famous Rocky Mountaineer train as it makes its way through dramatic scenery in the state of Utah.

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Paddy McGuinness visits a factory that makes 4 million individual Belgian chocolates every day. Ruth discovers the origin of St Nicholas and later visits a chocolate museum.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: As winter comes to an end, Alaskans journey, hunt, and prepare for spring.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben travels to the canyons of Utah to meet 72-year-old twins Bill and Bob Stone, who fled their adrenaline-junkie pasts for a tough subsistence lifestyle as they also deal with the challenges associated with growing old. He joins the brothers as they go cattle-wrangling, rock climbing and skydiving, while Ben also discovers more about them and why they decided to cut themselves off from civilisation. Once parachute instructors, police informants and bounty hunters, they are now organic farmers who are preparing for doomsday.

programme.title: The Great Intelligence Test
programme.desc: The Great British Intelligence Test measures the brainpower of the nation in one of the largest intelligence experiments of its kind.

programme.title: Joanna Lumleys Spice Trail Adventure
programme.desc: Joanna is heading to a collection of remote Indonesian islands so small that her first challenge is finding them on the map - the Banda Islands were once the only place on Earth where nutmeg grew.

programme.title: Deadly 60
programme.desc: Steve sets sail to Bali for a diving adventure to find a giant ocean sunfish. He rescues fish trapped in an abandoned net and meets the teenagers fighting to ban plastic bags on the island. 2/11

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Former New York fashion photographer John Wells (53) ago quit NYC four years ago for a life off the grid in one of the most inhospitable terrains on earth.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: The return of the programme in which Ben Fogle meets people who have moved to inhospitable parts of the world after leaving the rat race behind. He begins by travelling to the swamplands of southern Georgia in America to spend time with 64-year-old Colbert, a former financier who now lives in his hand-built wooden cabin. Ben learns some of the vital skills needed to survive in this dangerous backwater, including skinning roadkill, spearing frogs and drinking swamp water.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben journeys to one of the 7,000 remote tropical islands in the Philippines to live with `Jungle Neil Hoag, a 45-year-old former cabbie from Florida who struggled to make a living before finding the love of his life on the other side of the world.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: Sue Aikens must protect Kavik from the dangers that lurk in the shadows. The Hailstones use the cover of night to search for food under the ice.

programme.title: The Worlds Most Scenic Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Starting 1 mile above sea level in Colorados state capital Denver, cameras follow the famous Rocky Mountaineer train as it makes its way through dramatic scenery in the state of Utah.

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Gregg explores a factory in Grimsby that produces 80,000 fish fingers every day. He discovers that cod arrives at the factory as compressed blocks of frozen fish which are cut into finger shapes.

programme.title: Great Continental Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Yesterday HD12:00 PM to 1:00 PMMonday 8 JanuaryShareAdd to Calendar+Stockholm to the Arctic CircleSeason 7 Episode 6 of 10SSubtitlesMichael Portillo embarks on a thousand-mile journey from the Swedish capital of Stockholm to Abisko in the northern reaches of the Arctic Circle. In Stockholm, Michael braves a precarious tour of the city from its rooftops before boarding a heritage tram to get the lowdown on 1930s Sweden from an expert. Moving on, he finishes his journey deep in the Arctic Circle at a remote climate research station. He also has lunch with traditional Sami people in Vilhelmina and checks into an ice hotelGreat Continental Railway Journeys airs on Yesterday HD at 12:00 PM, Monday 8 January. (Subtitles.)TopicsLeisure hobbiesTourism ➝ TravelMichael PortilloPresenterAlison KrepsSeries EditorJohn ComerfordExecutive ProducerBen RowlandDirector

programme.title: The Secret Life of Trees
programme.desc: We discover how trees can extend their lives by `walking across the land and planting new roots, how they can `learn from trauma, and how a decaying tree has the miraculous ability to nurture new life.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: The Hailstones brave the freeze to seek new land for the expanding family. Sue Aikens must replenish her resources in Chena to survive the brutal cold.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Adventurer Ben Fogle meets Vanessa Forero deep in the Sierra Nevada de Santa Marta, an isolated mountain range in the north of Columbia.

programme.title: Asia: Making Of
programme.desc: Part 1. A behind-the-scenes look at this dazzling exploration of Earths biggest continent.

programme.title: Asia: Making Of

programme.title: Robson Green: Worlds Most Amazing Walks
programme.desc: Robson Green walks in the footsteps of the brave soldiers of the D-Day landings in Normandy, France, on an emotional journey of sacrifice and courage. 4/8

programme.title: Worlds Most Dangerous Roads: The Extra Mile
programme.desc: Rhod Gilbert presents a selection of some of the funniest and most dramatic moments from the series.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: When spring finally arrives in Alaska, the landscape and waterways come back to life with a vengeance as the snow and ice melt.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben meets a 40-year-old former communications manager who gave up her old life to train huskies in the Swedish Arctic Circle. Gaynor and her husband Milos live in a hand-built cabin with no running water.

programme.title: Truth About Takeaways
programme.desc: We Brits now eat 3 million takeaways a day. But what are they doing to us? Journalist Nikki Fox teams up with scientists at Liverpool John Moores University to run a unique experiment. 15 volunteers eat nothing but takeaways for two weeks and undergo a barrage of tests, from blood sugar and body fat to gut bacteria and mental sharpness.

programme.title: Joanna Lumleys Spice Trail Adventure
programme.desc: Joanna returns to her birthplace, India, starting in the majestic ancient city of Hampi, in search of a kitchen cupboard staple once known as black gold

programme.title: Ancient Powers
programme.desc: In a brutal world where nature is both friend and foe, our ancient powers are just beginning, they must use all their skill and ingenuity to shape their territory and establish their cultures.

programme.title: Great Continental Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo makes a grand tour of a favourite Edwardian destination - Italy - where he experiences first-hand the nations need for speed in a state-of-the-art Maserati sports car. Michael ends his journey in futuristic style with a high-speed boat trip across Lake Garda. 3/6

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben is closer to home than hes ever been in rural Oxfordshire where he spends the week with a multi-generational family, who surrendered their conventional life.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Explorer Ben Fogle meets more people whove turned their back on the rat race and set up home in some of the most remote and inhospitable parts of the world. In this series, Ben meets Alex, a retail whizz-kid who left the UK for his own remote Portuguese mountain. He joins Georg and Bettina, a European couple whove found solace in the Irish wilderness. And Ben visits Sandy, whos swapped a career in the tourist industry to rescue animals on a Greek Island. He also meets Helen and Jason, tackling life in the Shetlands, the most northerly point in the UK. And in the US, Ben travels the deserts of Arizona with Dee, a modern-day nomad living life out of her van.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: With the waterways open, Alaskans navigate the rivers for reconnaissance and resources. Andy Bassich and Denise Becker must endure a grueling process of launching their boats for a critical hunt.

programme.title: Treasures Decoded
programme.desc: The discovery of an executed man in Northern Italy reveals the truth behind the Roman practice of crucifixion. 6/6

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Gregg Wallace follows 27 tonnes of potatoes from a farm in Hampshire through the largest crisp factory on earth, as they are peeled, sliced and fried to make more than five million packets of crisps every 24 hours. Once the crisps are flavoured, theyre put into bags in one of the craziest rooms Greggs ever seen, with over 100 machines that can fill hundreds of thousands of bags every hour.

programme.title: Planet Earth III
programme.desc: Fresh water is the lifeblood of planet Earth, where incredible animal dramas play out. From death-feigning fish to frogs that glide, each depends on fresh water for their survival.

programme.title: Great Continental Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo embarks on a Greek odyssey from Athenss port of Piraeus north to the city of Thessaloniki, where Greeces King George I was assassinated in 1913. 4/6

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: Melting ice, open waterways, and extended daylight allow Alaskans to chase the opportunities of spring. Sue Aikens hunts the tundra for food but must remain wary of a recent injury.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild

programme.title: Treasures Decoded
programme.desc: A stunningly preserved tomb in an ancient Egyptian city, containing the mummy of a nameless, murdered pharaoh. Treasures Decoded looks into the city of Cleopatra, lost for over 1,000 years. 1/6

programme.desc: Joe Swash and Seann Walsh are no strangers to jungles after appearing on Im A Celebrity..., but neither of them has sought an ancient Mayan temple in Guatemala before.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: The adventurer travels to Central America to spend time with Englishman Ian Usher, a former truck driver who sold his belongings on eBay and bought a small island off the coast of Panama for £30,000. During his time with Ian, Ben helps him build jungle canoes, herd sheep onto boats and broadcast weather reports via a basic radio.

programme.title: Suuri ompelukisa
programme.desc: Kausi 6, 8/10. Katse kaannetaan maailmalle ja ensimmaisena haasteena on valmistaa filippiinilainen pusero perhoshihoineen ja paallystettyine nappeineen. Muunnostehtavassa taytyy provencelaisesta poytaliinasta luoda uusi asu vain 90 minuutissa. Viimeiseksi on vuorossa mittojen mukaan tehty flamencomekko vaikuttavine royheloineen.

programme.title: Suuri ompelukisa

Heidan tehtavansa on ommella mekko, josta Marilynkin haaveilisi! Muunnostehtavana on tehda roskasta science fiction -vaikutteinen asu 90 minuutissa. Kolmanneksi luodaan haikaiseva tanssiin sopiva mekko Kultahattu -elokuvan tyyliin.

programme.title: Suuri keramiikkakisa

programme.title: Travel Man: 48 tuntia ...
programme.desc: Viimeisella huviretkellaan Travel Manina Richard Ayoade rientaa Dubrovnikiin komedian kolossin Stephen Merchantin kanssa. Kaksikko laskeutuu maailman parhaiten museoituun keskiajan kaupunkiin syoksyakseen fantasian kimppuun. Parivaljakko lahtee paljolti Dubrovikissa kuvatun Game of Thronesin kierrokselle, jossa tarkastelevat joitain sarjan ikonisimpia tapahtumapaikkoja ennen jatkamistaan kokeilemaan paikallisesti tuotettuja Ston-ostereita. Simpukat hoideltuaan he suuntaavat kukkuloille, ja kahden ja puolen tunnin ajan he saavat kuraa paalleen kuullessaan alueen modernista historiasta monkijan kyydissa. Heidan minilomansa kulminoituu hetkeen, joka ei ole kummankaan toivelistalla, kun he istuvat Game of Thronesin valtaistuimen muovisella kopiolla.

programme.title: The Heroic Quest of the Valiant Prince Ivandoe
programme.desc: An arrogant little frogman needs the help of Prince Ivandoe to lift his curse and become the big, beautiful bullfrog he once was. Due to a technical error, Prince Ivandoe’s arms have been magically replaced by slimy froggy ones. So he has no choice but to help lift the curse in order to restore his princely arms. The Frogman’s hopeless attempts to find a True Love’s kiss end in failure. So Ivandoe and Bert convince him that his only hope is to earn the forgiveness of The Batwitch - his ex-girlfriend - who was responsible for cursing him in the first place.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Mr Small feels that he hasn’t inspired the children of Elmore Junior High so Gumball and Darwin try to lift his spirits. However when the vague platitudes lead to them trashing the school they need to hide the disaster from him to stop him realising how terrible his advice was.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Starmushs back is stuck, and the Mushelder has no choice but to ask for help in Mushton. Because Chep is the one that finds a solution to his back problem, Starmush chooses him to help with his daily activities. But Mush-Mush is jealous, he would have loved being the chosen one...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep is so good at moss-marbles, no one wants to play him anymore! No one except Sumush who reveals himself to be a tough competitor. To Chep’s disbelief, Sumush keeps on winning. But Lilit and Mush-Mush convince their friend not to give up. Chep decides to play his favourite moss-marble: the Rollinator. The one marble he never risked playing before...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Chanterelle sees how good Lilit is at painting, she offers to help her dig into her talent.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep is very excited: tonight, a rare and extremely stinky plant is going to bloom! But he already promised Mush-Mush to play their favourite game. When he chooses the flower instead, Mush-Mush is angry and the two friends stop talking. But when Mush-Mush realises that Chep is about to miss the blooming, he decides he won’t let that happen and helps his friend!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit take their compost meals back to their home-tree to eat, they think they have made a great new discovery.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit are playing dares and having a lot fun. All the Mushables are happy for them except Fung and Miff who keep mocking them.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings are all lined up on the couch to watch a cartoon film where a mouse plays nasty tricks on a cat. Grizzy, who has decided to take his nap, switches off the TV and confiscates the batteries of the remote control to make sure they cant switch their program back on. But is it wise to frustrate a gang of Lemmings whove been inspired by a gag-filled cartoon?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Once again, Grizzy shows the Lemmings that they just dont measure up to him physically and that the last jar of chocolate spread is for the strongest. The Lemmings find a way around this by increasing the power of a lamp that accelerates plant growth and instantly expand themselves to... bear size.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings lay their hands on a full crate of chocolate spread, which they hide somewhere behind Grizzys back. And since the Lemmings are both prudent and cunning, its impossible to surprise them when they pay a visit to their secret hoard. Until the day Grizzy discovers a magic ring that enables him to take on the appearance of a Lemming.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is persuaded that hes discovered the ultimate gadget for good living: a pair of connected glasses for watching TV in panoramic view, with all sorts of indicators, namely an intrusion warning signal. There is only one real drawback: the speedometer function which the Lemmings adore.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings clamor for their turn to play with the rangers mobile phone, but Grizzy isnt in the sharing mood. And hes very talented at flattening anything that comes near, without looking up from his game. The Lemmings invent an implacable protection system which should enable them to recover the mobile in complete safety.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is captivated by a mime artist on TV who makes viewers believe in the presence of an invisible wall. To get rid of the Lemmings, who have sights on his jar of Yummy, Grizzy hides the jar and pretends he has an invisible one. When the Lemmings see through the trick, they decide to trap Grizzy with a grand illusion number.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings shiver with cold, sneeze and are glassy-eyed: they have a big fat cold! They look so pitiful that Grizzy doesnt have the heart to throw them into the void, even if they are extremely annoying when they try to snuggle up to him to keep warm. He decides to heal them: the quicker they get better, the quicker Grizzy will be able to get rid of them pitilessly.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings find a pack of icy mints that literally chill your breath. One blast from anyone who eats them freezes everything in sight. Grizzy does not particularly care for this frosty ambiance and tries to take their candy away.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy cant believe it: he has just swallowed a spoonful of his favorite food, chocolate spread, and he hates it! How could that be possible? And yet, when he swiped the jar from the Lemmings, they seemed to be enjoying it immensely. A quick investigation reveals that the Lemmings added a dash of lemon juice to the jar to give the spread a sharper taste. And they intend to jazz up the rest of the stock as well!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers the fondness of his beloved she-bear for meditation. To seduce her he sets out to prove to her that he too can attain the Zen attitude.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean gets so engrossed playing with Mr Paliwal’s new drone that he doesn’t notice a car thief stealing his car. They quickly jump into Mr Paliwal’s car and use the drone to track the stolen car to the thief’s warehouse hideout. Using the drone, they discover a criminal car-stealing operation – but will they be able to outwit the car thieves using Mr Paliwal’s flying gadget?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Irma is dragging a very bored Mr Bean around a shopping centre when he spots a competition for Minty Mints – pull your silliest face for a photo and win a cash prize! Mr Bean tries to queue but it’s too long - so he persuades Irma to visit a photo studio offering romantic photoshoots. Can Mr Bean get away with pulling funny faces and submit the photo to the Minty Mints people without Irma knowing?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When Scrapper claws a rip in Teddy, Mr Bean rushes him to the Teddy hospital. As Teddy is being fixed, Mr Bean is rather taken with another Ted on sale in the shop. He decided to take Big Ted home with him once Teddy is fixed. But at home it seems as though Big Ted is freezing Teddy out, and after a particularly terrifying nightmare, Mr Bean realises he has to get rid of his new guest.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean takes Billy to a climbing centre but gets annoyed by a competitive dad who accuses him of being a beginner. Mr Bean insists he’s an expert but is made to prove it when they both compete for a trophy – the winner being the first to climb “The Big One”, a huge, scary wall for adults only! Mr Bean is determined to win but hadn’t counted on the competitive dad’s dirty tricks!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is waiting for Irma at the park for a picnic, when he sees a nervous man rehearsing an engagement proposal to his girlfriend. Mr Bean tries to show him how it’s done but manages to send the engagement ring flying! It lands in a bicycle basket, gets flicked into a pram, flung onto an ice cream - Mr Bean has to chase it around the park as it keeps being launched from place to place, in the hope he can save the day!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is under strict instructions to water Mr Paliwal’s precious plant once a day while he’s on holiday. It’s all going fine, and Mr Bean is enjoying playing with his neighbour’s gadgets while he’s away. However, one day he forgets his task and has to let himself in late at night – but Mr Bean’s other neighbour, Bruiser, spots the suspicious activity, and thinks Mr Paliwal’s got a burglar!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Mush-Mush discovers that Morel is afraid of the dark, he suggests that Chep, Lilit and he take the Mushlets to their first overnight forest camp

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Because Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit are always up to new adventures, Bolly has dubbed them The Adventurers. Flattered, our friends invite Bolly to choose his challenge to become an Adventurer too. Bolly will have to be the first Mushable to set foot somewhere. Mushton being crowded, Mush-Mush suggests they find an island, somewhere on the giant lake…

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Truff is happy. He has found a necklace that makes him even Truffier! Except he had no idea the necklace belongs to Starmush. And the Mushelder promised there will be consequences for whoever took it. Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit now have to save Truff from being consequenced…

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Lilit is under pressure. Truff, the most talented musician in Mushton, has invited her, Mush-Mush and Chep to form a band with him. Only problem is they can hardly play music! Truff insists: they just need to relax and feel the groove. But when Truff tells his new band they will perform at the Food Snail, Lilit isn’t relaxed at all!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Because he has won the moss-ball game last year, Puff is in charge of organizing this Summer’s Picnic. Only Puff isn’t comfortable in that role. Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit offer to help and make sure all the Mushables will follow Puff’s lead. Gradually, Puff gains confidence and ends up bossing everyone around. Now, all the Mushables are about to flee the Picnic!

programme.title: Tom And Jerry
programme.desc: One cat’s delicacy is another mouse’s poison. Tom and Jerry get caught in a thorny issue over the aroma of durian. Will the King of Fruits help reconcile their differences?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a strange creature fossilized in amber resin that resembles him. A natural science encyclopedia confirms that it’s his ancestor. Grizzy wants to take the block of amber, but the Lemmings fight him for it because the blue animal with big teeth is their ancestor too. The block cracks during their fight and frees the ancestor who turns out to be a rather unmanageable burden.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover a very particular cocoa tree with chocolate-spread sap! Reduced to eating canned Brussels sprouts, the only remaining food in the cabin, Grizzy is baffled when he sees the Lemmings parading past to equip themselves with all sorts of containers: ladles, soup spoons, bowls, buckets, basins, etc. He watches them through binoculars and discovers that they have planted a faucet in a tree where chocolate spread flows. Grizzy decides to siphon off their tree.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy expels the Lemmings from the cabin where they had built a cumbersome obstacle course. Peaceful at last and feeling lazy, he is determined not to leave his couch. The Lemmings discover a magic Mayan disc that allows you to choose instantaneous mutations of other animals’ features: bat wings, reindeer antlers, elephant trunks, etc. The mutant Lemmings return to the cabin, determined to continue playing their game while enjoying their new accessories.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: As they fight over the last jar of chocolate spread, Grizzy and the Lemmings accidentally send it flying deep into the jungle. They both set out in search for the jar, but in a forest that dense, it’s an impossible mission. In a Mayan Temple, the Lemmings discover a magic bracelet that increases one’s sense of smell tenfold and use it to find the jar. Grizzy loses their trail, but finds some Mayan bracelets himself: one for eyesight and one for hearing. Enough to infallibly track down the Lemmings!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Just as Grizzy is about to go to bed, he ousts the Lemmings who are holding a surprise party in the cabin. The Lemmings land in a Mayan Temple devoted to the moon. While toying with an ancestral console, the Lemmings set off a cosmic phenomenon that brings the moon, which is now the size of a disco ball, to the temple. In its aura, gravity becomes very weak. Enough to get rid of Grizzy and have a very original fiesta.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy does his best to get rid of the Lemmings and enjoy some peace and quiet in the cabin, but each time they come back with a new and even more-disturbing activity. When he sees some penguins marching in a perfectly disciplined line, Grizzy decides to teach the Lemmings how to behave in his presence. He locks himself up with them inside the garage, which has been transformed into an elementary school classroom. Grizzy is determined to make discipline reign but he has forgotten about the Lemming’s natural penchant for bedlam.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight once again and cause an accident with Santa Claus’ sled. The Lemmings rush to the crash site and get their hands on Santa’s magic bag. While Grizzy is tidying up the cabin after their fight, he is baffled to see the Lemmings come back him, quiet and calm. The rodents break out into Christmas carols and prepare a delicious snack for Grizzy before slipping out again. Suspicious, Grizzy follows them and discovers that the bag rewards persons whose wishes are equal to their goodwill.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings do not agree on which program to watch on TV. Grizzy confiscates the remote-control device. He thinks he’s won the battle, but the Lemmings find another one at the research station. A furious combat begins until the adversaries realize that the research station device has a special button that controls objects.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have a blast racing down the ice slope in competition with the stuffed Bear-Ranger and manage to win each time. Grizzy cannot stand seeing his avatar humiliated and he decides to enter the competition to help him. Their frenzied descent gets out of hand and everyone is propelled all the way to the hangar of the research station, where they discover an ultra-sophisticated racing game. The racecourse sprawls over the entire icefield via drones that project holographic elements. Grizzy and the Lemmings get into super-fast snowmobiles and launch into the race of the century.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A crafty cat burglar is causing alarm and concern throughout the town with a series of daring rooftop robberies. After Mrs Wickets house is burgled and Bean has his wallet stolen he decides the only way to deal with this cunning housebreaker is to don a costume and become a superhero (like the ones in his favourite comic book). But Super Bean soon finds he has his hands full helping to rescue cats stuck in trees and old ladies with their spilled shopping.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is tidying his flat and chucking out a load of old unwanted junk. Unfortunately during the big clear out Teddy accidentally falls into a bin bag which gets put out in the street. Bean is horrified when the rubbish van arrives and he realises that dear old Teddy is now on his way to the landfill. Bean races across town to the dump but how will he ever find his friend amongst all the mountains of junk?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean buys a robot to clean his flat but it ends up trashing half the town.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean wants an ice cream from the ice cream van but ends up serving himself – along with every kid in town.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is feeling very left out when he discovers that Mrs Wicket is having a huge party downstairs and apparently he isnt invited. Bean tries every trick in the book to sneak himself into the party - even resorting to hiding inside an enormous cake. If only he knew the real reason for the celebration.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A strange object is delivered to the Rangers cabin: an over-board! Its a latest generation skateboard which levitates above the ground without wheels.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover the joys of photography with the rangers instant print camera. Grizzy would like to make a beautiful artistic portrait of the she-bear hes in love with, whereas the Lemmings prefer a group photo with a face-making competition: two radically opposed artistic trends!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The fridge in the cabin has changed: it’s been replaced by a brand new state-of-the-art appliance which analyzes the body fat percentage of whoever wants to serve himself, before selecting the appropriate foodstuffs.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy watches a demonstration of balloon modelling on TV. He decides to make a balloon poodle to offer to the she-bear hes enamored with. By observing Grizzy, the Lemmings discover with enthusiasm that you can blow up modelling balloons far more than regular ones, and that they end up exploding in a shower of tattered strips.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy needs a nice nap. He cant find a pillow comfortable enough to his taste until he tests the pillow that the Lemmings use as a high-jump mat. The pillow is so soft that Grizzy falls asleep the second he lays his head on it.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is awakened from his nap by the unpleasant, ongoing sound of Velcro strips being ripped off. The Lemmings have covered their bodies in Velcro and are throwing themselves against a doormat, which serves as their target. Grizzy finds peace and quiet by getting rid of the doormat until the Lemmings realize that bear fur is an ideal support for Velcro.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: When the ghost of a small towns founder returns to scare off mayoral candidates, the gang decides to run Velma as mayor to bait the ghost. They quickly discover, however, that Velma lacks the skillset to make her a popular politician!

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The gang travels to Britain in 1843-ish and runs into Scrooge who claims he was attacked by the ghost of his partner Jacob Marley and that three more ghosts are coming. The gang agrees to solve the mystery but Velma wonders if she has more potential than just solving mysteries.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Music Meister is stealing the singing voices of all the people in Gotham. Now its up to bashful Buff to gain confidence in his voice and use it to take down Music Meister.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Batwings favorite Bat-Net gets ripped during a chase with Riddler, she must learn to let go of her old net. / Clayface, Gotham Citys messiest villain, arrives to cause trouble during Gothams annual Clean Up Day.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry Gokko
programme.desc: Tom is making pastries at the bakery. He takes Jerry and Tuffy and puts them in the pastries. Tuffy and Jerry both escape and make a pastry of their own, scaring Tom away.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired to build a festive course for the Fall foot race. Wile E. Coyote is determined to beat the Road Runner with his Robo-Runner despite its malfunctions.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Zaida Gator hires The Looney Builders to build her a boat so she can share her beignets in the swamp. She soon realizes there are others to share with elsewhere and enlists the crew to make it possible.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The clumsy hero is kept awake by the deafening sound of roadworks outside his bedroom window, but a plot to restore peace by feeding the workmen goes spectacularly wrong.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean settles in for dinner and TV, but his cozy night ends in chaos when a spring-loaded sofa launches him out of relaxation—and off his seat.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean drops Irma off at the airport – she and Lottie are going on a lovely sunny holiday without them. To cheer Teddy up, Mr Bean has a brainwave - don’t worry, we’ll have a holiday right here at home! So Mr Bean goes about recreating all the things he saw in Irma’s brochure – a flight on an Bean Airways and a stay at Hotel Bean with sea view and a pool! Hope Irma is having a great time too…

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: At a funfair, Mr Bean wins a balloon for Teddy and ties it to him while he plays on the hook a duck. But he’s so engrossed he doesn’t notice his companion floating away! Soon Mr Bean is chasing Teddy as he glides and snags on various fairground rides. Will Mr Bean rescue Teddy before he floats away forever?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs Wicket has just inherited an antique grandfather clock – Mr Bean is impressed! But he soon starts to resent it when it bongs loudly on the hour all through the night. Desperate for sleep as dawn is breaking, he fiddles inside the clock, only for it to fall apart and onto the floor! Can he get the bulky heirloom to a repair shop and back before Mrs Wicket wakes up?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Turns out constant, relentless failure can put a strain on a relationship. Specs and Skinny are no exception, and when yet another chase ends in embarrassment, misfortune, and physical injury, the Docs finally fall prey to “irreconcilable differences”. For a shapechanger, Lamput sure doesn’t like change; it’s like mum and dad are fighting. Lamput sets about trying to help the Docs patch things up. When conventional methods fail, our orange buddy is forced to subvert the very fundamentals of animated storytelling. Lamput’s perseverance finally pays off. The Docs have an epiphany: this blob trying to fix our friendship? Obviously that’s the real enemy.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput and Specs find themselves on an island. Spec learns a harsh lesson on listening.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput’s been caught! The Docs don’t have much to do now but to give tours to visiting students. Until one of these students, Tuzki specifically, gets lost. Will Tuzki find his way back to class? Not unless Lamput has something to do with it.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While looking for the TV remote-control device Grizzy happens onto a box that can localize a bunch of keys thanks to its key ring which is equipped with a tracker.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While looking for the TV remote-control device, Grizzy happens onto a box that can localize a bunch of keys thanks to its key ring, which is equipped with a tracker. Grizzy decides to stick the spy device under a jar of chocolate spread, just in case the Lemmings should decide to carry it off.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings create a customized hang-glider using a supermarket shopping cart for the nacelle and a ventilator as an engine. Their aerobatics fascinate the she-bear that Grizzy is in love with, which gives him the idea of replacing the shopping cart with a double-seat and inviting his beloved for a sky promenade. But confiscating a wing in mid-flight is not within the reach of just any old bear.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings scribble all over the book Snow White on the living room sofa. Grizzy throws them off with scant ceremony and they crash to the floor with their book.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings favorite chocolate spread brand is organizing a big competition where the prize is a giant jar of spread. To win, one must make ten baskets in a row in a hoop set up on a supermarket parking lot for the occasion. Ready to play?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Freed from the ice which had preserved him for millions of years, a saber-toothed bear bursts into the cabin, starving to death. Grizzy fails to protect his reserves while the Lemmings fail at taming him for the rodeo - even though they all team up. But when they realize that a prehistoric necklace will enable them to control the creature, its each man for himself again!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: After Tyke digs up, Hammy, Spikes lucky bone, Spike reburies it right away because its bad luck to remove it. Soon afterward, Tom gets a set of toy dog bones that do tricks, and he teases Spike and Tyke with them. When the whirly-bone buries itself and unearths Hammy for a second time, Spike recruits the other animals to help prevent the bad luck he expects.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: A ghost paints a flattering portrait of Tom, but Tom is stingy with his payment and the ghost casts a spell on the portrait. Strange things start happening as the portrait absorbs injuries and calories that should be affecting Tom. However, soon Jerry and Tuffy figure out whats going on and use it to their advantage.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Rick and Ginger are asked to dog-sit for a friends French poodle, Sabrina, Tom is initially on his guard, but soon hes practically eating out of her hand. Next, Spike falls for Sabrina and does everything he can to impress her with how kind he is to Tom. How long will everyones behavior be affected by Sabrinas presence?

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom, Jerry and Tuffy have a run-in with a moving suit of armor. The knight scares Tom away, but Jerry makes a brave stand because he thinks the knight is Tom in disguise. Jerry eventually trips the suit of armor and finds out its inhabited by three kittens. Relieved at first, the pets soon realize that battling one haunted knight is nothing compared to battling three real-life kittens.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Jerrys high-born cousin Count DaCalories—a haughty city mouse—visits the estate. At first, he acts sleek and refined, but soon he cant resist pigging out and going on multiple kitchen raids. As his paunch grows, it becomes more and more difficult for him to outrun Tom and stay out of sight of the Duchesss visitor.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: In Catsylvania, the peasant mice oompah band plays onstage at the auditorium. As the bandleaders lovely daughter, Gretta, hits a high note in her rousing song, Tom—in a mask and hood—swings in on a rope and abducts her. Van Mouseling and the peasant band chase him through the rafters and backstage, but Tom escapes with his captive to a subterranean lair. Will the mice manage to free Gretta?

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After Jestah’s insults get the best of her, a short-tempered Bibi tries to not let the big-wheeled bullys words get to her so she can help Batgirl catch Harley.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Feeling neglected after being passed over on missions, Bam asks MOE to install experimental upgrades to curry Batmans favor. But, when Bams new powers are stronger than he can control, Batman – and the mission – are suddenly in danger!

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: When an Artificial Intelligence takes over the building of a trendy tech company, the gang has to solve the computerized mystery - and maybe learn a lesson about relying too much on technology.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The Gang has seats on the largest airplane ever to fly the open airways! Unfortunately the plane is also beset by a Gremlin bent on sabotaging the flight! The Gang has to step up to solve the airborne mystery as well as deal with something even scarier: Daphne flying a plane!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Irma are off for a day at the seaside. Irma is travelling light but Bean wants to take almost everything his owns in an enormous trunk. Arriving at the seaside Bean’s trunk gets accidentally swapped with a trunk belonging to a famous stage magician. As Bean entertains Irma pulling rabbits out of hats the angry magician arrives on the scene - and he’s not a happy bunny.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean loves playing in the neighbourhood soft play centre – bouncing on the trampolines whizzing down the slides and most of all immersing himself in the ball pool. But he doesn’t like sharing the place with all those annoying kids. So Bean decides to turn his flat into his own private play area where he can play in peace. Unfortunately Irma Mrs Wicket and The Bruisers all want to join in the fun with him.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean orders a takeaway pizza but when it arrives he feels let down by the size of it. So he sets out to bake his own unique Teddy shaped pizzas. Under the name Pizza Bean his pizzas become extremely popular and very soon business in booming. As a result rival pizza producer Don Crustyoni sees his profits plummeting and decides to make Mr Bean an offer he can’t refuse.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is not allowed to fly off on holiday as his passport has no photograph. After failing to get one from a photo booth he tries numerous other ways to get his photo taken including photobombing a tourist’s snap. None of these work but after Bean is arrested maybe the police can assist him. Say cheese!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean wants to impress Irma by entering them both into a dance competition at the local park. But his tango is terrible and his rumba ridiculous so he enrols for lessons at a local dance school. After an unsuccessful class at the dance studio and a trip to the library to teach himself Mr Bean has lost track of time. He needs to make it up to a disgruntled Irma but will his homemade effort ‘win’ her over.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Chased by a raging elephant, Grizzy and the Lemmings are ejected from the cabin and land on a small nearby promontory. One of the rodents finds himself seated upon a throne-shaped boulder. A ray of sunlight illuminates him, and the savannah animals bow down before the Lemming king! But as soon as he leaves his royal seat, his powers disappear. Grizzy grabs the opportunity to plop down on the throne. Upon his orders, the other animals seek to provide him with every comfort, bringing the cabin, television and food closer. But the Lemmings put their feet down.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings create an irresistible rhythm on a set of magic drums and kick off a battle of the bands with Grizzy, who just wants a good nights sleep.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In the midst of a heat wave, Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the fridge. The rodents want to transform themselves into ice cubes to glide across their super curling ice slide, while Grizzy wishes merely to lie down inside the nice, cool appliance. After literally breaking the fridge in two, the Lemmings discover a container of refrigerant and create a new giant curling sheet in the savannah. But Grizzy has not given up the idea of resting in a cool spot!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy has gone all out for his dinner guest, the she-bear. But just as he is about to kiss her...Vroom! In the middle of a mad car race, the Lemmings wake him up with a jolt!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy watches a documentary on salmon, whereas the Lemmings want to dance it up in the garage, nightclub style. TV versus music, the sonic war has begun!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A confrontation between Grizzy and the Lemmings leads to a room in the castle tower. The bear accidentally sets off a mechanism and discovers a large medieval magic trunk.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: When the Lemmings spoil Grizzys meal with their new game, the bear evicts them far from the cabin. They crash onto a faraway picnic table.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings are holding a log throwing competition that stops short when Grizzy sends them soaring into the distance.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the TV remote control. The argument leads the bear to the summit of the castle tower during a storm.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: After a series of beatings from Tom, Jerry storms off into his mouse hole. Soon he falls asleep and dreams himself to be the Lord of Downton Abbey! Tom is now servant to Lord Jerry, and the Master wastes no time in making Toms life miserable. Tom is caught in the act of exacting revenge, so Lord Jerry challenges Tom to a duel in the dream world.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Jerry is feeling lonely and wishes he had a girlfriend. Spike explains spring fever to Tom and they leave him be. Jerrys mood improves when he gets a message from his brawny cousin Muscles, who has fixed him up with his girlfriends friend for a double date.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Jerrys country cousins visit the Abbey, the cook is convinced Downton is in the midst of a vermin invasion! Cates (the butler) presses Tom into service with the threat of becoming a stable cat otherwise. Tom pursues the cunning, feisty bumpkins, and Jerry, throughout the manor, and they delight in making surprise appearances to Tom in awkward moments.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Jerry discovers the mysterious phobia cats have toward cucumbers and is inspired to try it out on Tom. After freaking Tom out repeatedly, Butch steps in to counsel Tom and help him overcome his fear, only Butch is far from immune himself. The two encounter more and more trouble as they deal with their phobia.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: A dim-witted cat walks into the detective agency asking for help. It seems he has lost his marbles: Hes the citys champion marble player and has either misplaced his case of lucky marbles, or its been stolen. The cat is desperate to find them before the big tournament. Its up to Tom and Jerry to retrace the cats steps and solve this mystery.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Ginger and Rick have installed a new birdbath, and Little Quacker has taken up residence in it. Ginger forbids Tom from going out in the back and has Rick move Spikes house. The dog and cat soon unite to return Little Quacker to the pond without Ginger finding out theyre responsible for sending him packing.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry: Santas Little Helpers
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry are joined by Nibbles Mouse, aka Tuffy, as they ring in a wild wintertime celebration. Jerry and Tuffy are living the good life in Santas workshop until the day Tom is rescued by the Claus family! With Tom in the house, theres nothing but merry mayhem at the North Pole. But when the dust settles, can the comically destructive duo work together to save Christmas and learn the true meaning of friendship?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: After a head-on collision with the milkman, Mr. Beans landlady isrushed to hospital, leaving him to look after her odious one-eyed cat Scrapper. Fur isnt the only thing that flies and in the end its Bean that needs looking after.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A milkman accidentally walks off with a maritime curio belonging to Bean _ who indignantly follows him to the bottling plant at the local dairy, determined to retrieve it.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean’s attempt to cut the grass is thwarted by a pesky root which refuses to budge. When Mr Bean breaks his spade he heads to the local Garden Centre to find a replacement. But instead of simply buying one he enters a gardening competition to win one - judged by none other than the Queen herself! Its gardening gloves off when Mr Bean goes into battle with his rival green-fingered competitors.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Irma are off for a day at the seaside. Irma is travelling light but Bean wants to take almost everything his owns in an enormous trunk. Arriving at the seaside Bean’s trunk gets accidentally swapped with a trunk belonging to a famous stage magician. As Bean entertains Irma pulling rabbits out of hats the angry magician arrives on the scene - and he’s not a happy bunny.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Poison Ivy uses a rare pollen-spewing flower to put all of Gotham to sleep, its up to Bibi to save her friends and save the day. / Super-genius villain Egghead is on the loose, planning to use Gotham Museum’s famed giant egg to cook up a record-breaking breakfast.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After snagging an ultra-fuel-cell upgrade, the Ducky Boat suddenly becomes the fastest vehicle in Gotham. Later, confident leader Bam must rally the Batwheels to stop the turbo-Ducky!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Buff befriends Mr Freezes snowcrawler Snowy, the other Batwheels bristle at the thought of hanging out with a bad guy so Buff sets out to change their minds.

programme.title: Krypto Saves the Day!
programme.desc: When a black cat crosses Krypto’s path, he’s determined to catch it before Halloween night is through. / Once upon a time the Penguin boy visits the Bear. He tries to entertain him and involve him in various activities but the Penguin spends most of the time playing with Masha.

programme.title: Krypto Saves the Day!
programme.desc: Krypto smells something special in a holiday package, and in his eagerness to grab the gift he makes a mess of Metropolis’s festivities. / While escaping from a grizzly bear Ivandoe and Bert fall into an underground cave where a large Troll-woman in a party dress keeps them captive.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Pauleen Penguin hires The Looney Builders to build an ice bowling alley in Looneyburg. Her homesickness causes setbacks until the crew helps her feel better.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired by Mac Gopher to build a hot air balloon for him and Tosh to ride in for a festival. Tosh keeps his fear of flying to himself and tries to weigh down the build to avoid liftoff.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry Gokko
programme.desc: Jerry sneaks into the party set up to steal some cheese while Tom is sleeping. Tom wakes up and chases Jerry across a table filled with all kinds of food. During the chase, Tom eats a melon which turns him into a sphere shape and Jerry eats a piece of cheese which turns him into a triangle shape.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this bears privilegeexcept the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a trunk, Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a big chocolate egg with a surprise inside. They are licking their lips. As they fight, they accidentally send the coveted egg flying amidst a group of penguins where a couple of winged creatures adopt it. They sit on the egg as if it were their offspring. Not intimidated, Grizzy and the Lemmings decide to get their hands on it, but the entire bird colony intervenes.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings open a nightclub with blasting music and a disco ball in an igloo they have built not far from the cabin. The noise prevents Grizzy from sleeping. The bear confiscates the disco ball and propels the Lemmings far into the distance. They land in an ice cave where they discover a console that lights up the stars in the sky and controls the northern lights. The canopy of heaven starts blinking. The Lemmings transform the ice field into an open-air discotheque!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings come up with a ride worthy of a county fair in the living room. Awakened, Grizzy throws their juice extractor out the window and the rodents land in the neighboring science station where they accidentally wake up… a mammoth! A friendship is born between them. The Lemmings drag the mastodon into their game, and he transforms the entire cabin into a Ferris Wheel. Grizzy, who was trying to doze in peace, wakes up in a panic.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Before an audience of penguins and walruses, two teams of Lemmings perform acrobatic high jumps, competing for the winning prize. When Grizzy accidentally jumps in, he quickly gets caught up in the game and the clapometer goes wild! Intoxicated by his victory, the bear is by no means a modest winner! But the Lemmings want their moment of glory in the limelight as well!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While Grizzy fishes, a penguin comes over and sees that the bears bucket is empty. He decides to help him and catches piles of fish. Impressed, the bear brings the penguin back to the cabin, where a friendship rapidly strikes up. This pleasant and friendly new companion quickly arouses the Lemmings curiosity. They lure the penguin away on the sly and replace him with another one whos not nearly as clever. Grizzy will quickly see through the trickery.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: After a beautiful start to a beautiful day, a sudden storm cuts the fun short and the Docs have to go home. Lamput accidentally gets taken home with them. As always, Lamput makes himself at home. No one is the wiser until the next morning. It’s time for Skinny and Specs to go into full on detective mode and to find out who or what is in their house. Can Lamput make a run for it before they find him?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs pursue Lamput across a vast desert. Things go wrong and all three end up stranded with no way to call for help. Stuck with each other, the trio roam the desert as days turn into years and the Docs grow old. One day, they find a map that leads to a Fountain of Youth and a way out of the desert, but can they survive the journey across the harsh, sand sea?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs finally catch Lamput! Mission accomplished…and now they have nothing to do. Every other job to catch lab experiments gone rogue is a piece of cake compared to Lamput. Realizing that they’ve lost their lives’ purpose, Specs and Skinny decide to break Lamput out of the lab’s hi-tech prison so that they can go back to catching him again.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean gets so engrossed playing with Mr Paliwal’s new drone that he doesn’t notice a car thief stealing his car. They quickly jump into Mr Paliwal’s car and use the drone to track the stolen car to the thief’s warehouse hideout. Using the drone, they discover a criminal car-stealing operation – but will they be able to outwit the car thieves using Mr Paliwal’s flying gadget?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Irma is dragging a very bored Mr Bean around a shopping centre when he spots a competition for Minty Mints – pull your silliest face for a photo and win a cash prize! Mr Bean tries to queue but it’s too long - so he persuades Irma to visit a photo studio offering romantic photoshoots. Can Mr Bean get away with pulling funny faces and submit the photo to the Minty Mints people without Irma knowing?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean discovers he has a doppelganger: Mr. Pod. They wear the same clothes and look exactly alike. Unfortunately, it all goes wrong when his girlfriend, Irma, thinks that Mr. Pod is much more handsome than Bean.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Inspired by a wildlife documentary on TV, Mr. Bean dusts off his camera and treks deep into the countryside in search of the perfect wildlife photograph. After two fruitless days of being the hunter, he is somewhat miffed to find himself the hunted.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The she-bear Grizzy is enamored with has lost her favorite flower in an inaccessible spot under a giant boulder. Grizzy tries to lift it: impossible! He decides to start an intensive bodybuilding routine with the rangers electrostimulation machine, but the Lemmings are already using it on a caribou to step up their rodeo.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings try to catch a bat to play rodeo, disturbing Grizzy as he plays his favorite game on the rangers mobile. But when the phone is hit and its alarm activated, a submarine sonar sound is emitted. When the bat hears it, it seems to become docile.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have a blast testing every app on the rangers tablet one by one. Grizzy, who is starving, sees that the cupboards are bare. When he realizes that one GPS app can give the itinerary to the nearest chocolate spread store, Grizzy requisitions the tablet.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover the rangers latest acquisition: a 3D printer that will duplicate anything at all in miniature format. Grizzy wants to redecorate the cabin with figurines bearing his effigy, but first he needs to get rid of the Lemmings. Without getting them mixed up with their perfect resin replicas.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a strange gateway to a parallel world. On the other side, there is the same cabin, only it doesnt belong to a ranger. Its a chocolate spread museum, where the curators are... another Grizzy and other Lemmings, all with very different personalities.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings clumsily destroy the TV remote control while fighting over who gets to watch their favorite program. While looking for a backup zapper, they happen onto a top secret Canadian Army prototype that enables you to apply the usual controls: play, pause and fast forward to living beings.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover that by changing the speed limit sign on the side of the road they can create a huge draft that is just perfect for their extreme kiting game.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While trying to stop the Lemmings from playing their extreme trampoline game, Grizzy slips on the canvas and unwittingly executes an amazing somersault in front of his beloved she-bear. Seeing that she wants more, Grizzy decides to become a champ in the sport. But for that to happen, the Lemmings will need to let him work out.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have hitched up a racoon with a sweet tooth to their sled and get a ride by throwing cookies in front of the creature with a sling. To recover the supply of cookies, which were to be his afternoon snack, Grizzy has no qualms about making the Lemmings sled skid out of control. When the sled hits a superheros spacecraft, a mysterious costume falls out.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings come up with a ride worthy of a county fair in the living room. Awakened, Grizzy throws their juice extractor out the window and the rodents land in the neighboring science station where they accidentally wake up… a mammoth! A friendship is born between them. The Lemmings drag the mastodon into their game, and he transforms the entire cabin into a Ferris Wheel. Grizzy, who was trying to doze in peace, wakes up in a panic.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings play with poseable figurines of wild Canadian animals. When Grizzy sees that the bear figurine has been put inside a little cage, whereas those of the Lemmings are gathered around a mini-jar of chocolate spread, he decides to join in the party and take control of his own figurine.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers a new generation Tamagotchi game on the Rangers tablet: the camera scans the player and gives him a virtual avatar of himself to take care of.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
